p: Possible recombination was investigated by comparing the HPeV5 genome obtained from G001-19 against the two nearest complete HPeV3 and HPeV5 sequences from GenBank: AM23749.1 HPeV5 T92-15 detected in California in 1992 and KY55671.1 HPeV3 CSF19, detected from Australia in 2013 in Simplot [ 14] using a window size of 200 and step size of 20.
